effects.display_string: Set: Your healing spells have a chance to apply Insurance! to their targets that heals them for 1 million over 15 sec. Insurance! is consumed if an ally drops below 40% health to heal them for 499,849.

Set: When your Power Word: Shield is completely absorbed on an ally, they are granted Insurance! at 40% effectiveness. Allies with your Insurance! or absorption effects receive 15% increased healing from you.

name: Faded Championship Ring
description: 'I got one more in me' - Unknown

spells.description:
Use: Bind a spectral essence to an enemy for 20 sec, causing allied attacks to heal for 30% of damage dealt, up to 1.6 million total healing.

When the essence expires or is removed early, the remaining healing bursts, healing up to 5 allies within 8 yds. (1 Min 30 Sec Cooldown)

Use: Deal yourself in, granting you 7,635 to 9,331 Mastery for 15 sec and stacking the deck. Stacking the deck increases the minimum Mastery on future hands by 283 until you leave combat, up to 3 times. (1 Min 30 Sec Cooldown)
Equip: Embrace the darkness. Double the effects of your other Nerubian embellished item, positive and negative.
Use: Zap yourself for 228,561 Nature damage, gaining 14,594 Intellect for 15 sec. (45 Sec Cooldown)
Equip: You champion the causes of your guild.  All guild reputation gains are increased by 100%.
